snippet.title: Mega Drive Longplay [133] Phantasy Star III: Generations of Doom (Part 1 of 10)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Valis77

This is one of many games people overlooked. It pales in comparison to it's predecessors with it's low graphics and sound, but i think it's unique, you can choose who you will marry and spawn diffrent "Generations" of your offspring, this will determine what the ending will be. I got all the endings but it required much editing -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
